it.azraelsec.Document

Class Section

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.azraelsec.Document.Section
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Section
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Section class represents a Document section and contains a portion of the document's itself.

    Each Section is stored individually on a different file.

    Author:
    Federico Gerardi, https://azraelsec.github.io/
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
